description:
A lightweight, carry-on-sized travel pack for minimalist globetrotters. The Fairview 40 meets most carry-on restrictions, with front compression straps to help you squeak by if it's a close call. The comfortable shoulder straps and hipbelt make it easy to shoulder your load, and they zip away behind a panel in case you're forced to gate-check. The main compartment opens like a suitcase for easy packing and unpacking, and a quick-access laptop sleeve makes it easy to grab your laptop at airport security or once you reach your seat.

  • Made of durable 450-denier recycled polyester to withstand the demands of travel
  • Foam AirScape® backpanel with LightWire frame transfers the load evenly while maintaining airflow to your back
  • Adjustable torso length and sternum strap accommodates a wide range of users
  • Stowaway harness and hipbelt zip behind a panel for protection when you check your bag
  • Large U-shaped zippered opening provides easy access to the main compartment
  • Lockable zippers on the main compartment for worry free transport
  • Padded top and side handles provide comfortable carry options in suitcase mode
  • Interior mesh pockets and compression straps keep your stuff organized
  • Quick access padded sleeve holds a 16in. laptop
  • Large front shove it pocket and external zippered toiletry pocket
  • Stretch mesh hip belt pocket
  • External straps let you compress the load
  • Compatible with the Farpoint/Fairview® Daypack or Daylite® packs
name: Osprey Farpoint 40 Travel Pack - Men's
